mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate=NOW(), updateDate=NOW(), boardId = #{boardId}, memberId = #{memberId}, title=#{title}, `body`=#{body}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra_writerName FROM article as A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE article
title = #{title},
body = #{body},
updateDate = NOW()
